text: St. Aloysius College, Manizales, Colombia, (Colegio San Luis), was founded by the Society of Jesus in 1954 and has become coeducational, covering two years of kindergarten through grade 11 of high school. ==References== Category:Jesuit secondary schools Category:Educational institutions established in 1954 Category:Buildings and structures in Manizales
title: St. Aloysius College Gonzaga, Manizales
